amendment.description: Amendment permits Federal Prison Industries to have a mandatory source contract for procurement by the Bureau of Prisons.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to allow a contract to be made to Federal Prison Industries using other than competitive procedures.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MI) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Smith (MI).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (MI) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
